entries.name: vz
entries.info: Z component of the reconstructed vertex (cm)

entries.name: theta
entries.info: Theta from the Helix fit of the track (deg)

entries.name: phi
entries.info: Phi from the Helix fit of the track (deg)

entries.name: nhits
entries.info: Number of hits in the track

entries.name: adcsum
entries.info: Total ADC sum of the Track

entries.name: x_helix
entries.info: X-coordinate of the center of helix fit (mm)

entries.name: y_helix
entries.info: Y-coordinate of the center of helix fit (mm)

entries.name: chi2_helix
entries.info: Chi squared of the helix fit

entries.name: min_row
entries.info: Pad row of hit with smallest time

entries.name: min_col
entries.info: Pad col of hit with smallest time

entries.name: max_row
entries.info: Pad row of hit with largest time

entries.name: max_col
entries.info: Pad col of hit with largest time

entries.name: min_time
entries.info: Smallest time in track not shifted (ns)

entries.name: max_time
entries.info: Largest time in track not shifted (ns)
